trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> methods, both of which return a GeneralTransform3D object.
In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class.

The GeneralTransform3D class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.
GeneralTransform3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
CloneCurrentValue is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the inverse transformation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref>, if possible.
Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
IFormattable.ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The format to use.

-or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.

-or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
Creates a string representation of this instance.
ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A string representation of this instance.
Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <xref:System.IFormatProvider> parameter.
ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
<xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance used to process this instance.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
Transform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming point.
The transform did not succeed.
When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming `inPoint`.
if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
